disease_name: Hypercholesterolemia||Mixed dyslipidemia||Cardiovascular disease||Myocardial infarction||Unstable angina pectoris||Hyperlipidemia (post-transplant)
indication: high cholesterol||high blood fat||prevention of cardiovascular events||history of myocardial infarction||unstable angina||post-transplant hyperlipidemia
recommended_usage: take with or without food||at fixed time
single_dose: adults 10-40 mg once a day||cardiovascular prevention 40 mg per day||post-transplant (immunosuppressive therapy) 20 mg per day (up to 40 mg)||renal or hepatic insufficiency 10 mg per day
mechanism_of_action: competitive inhibition of HMG-CoA reductase, reduces cholesterol synthesis, increases LDL receptor expression, increases LDL catabolism, inhibits VLDL synthesis
side_effects: muscle pain||joint pain||muscle cramps||muscle weakness||elevated creatine kinase||increased liver enzymes||dizziness||headache||sleep disturbances||insomnia||nightmares||vision disturbances||blurred vision||double vision||digestive disorders||abdominal pain||nausea||vomiting||constipation||diarrhea||bloating||itching||rash||hives||hair changes||hair loss||difficulty urinating||frequent urination||nocturia||peripheral polyneuropathy||paraesthesia||anaphylaxis||angioedema||lupus erythematosus-like syndrome||jaundice||hepatitis||fulminant hepatic necrosis||rhabdomyolysis||myopathy||interstitial lung disease||diabetes mellitus||dermatomyositis
unsuitable_population: children under 18||pregnant women||breastfeeding women||patients with active liver disease||patients with persistent elevated transaminases||patients with hereditary problems of galactose intolerance, Lapp lactase deficiency, or glucose-galactose malabsorption

indication: signs and symptoms of idiopathic Parkinson's disease
side_effects: nausea||dizziness||drowsiness||sleepiness||headache||dyskinesia||increase or decrease in blood pressure||increase or decrease in heart rate||hallucinations||gambling urges||sexual urges||other intense urges

disease_name: severe eosinophilic asthma||eosinophilic granulomatosis with polyangiitis||chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
indication: severe asthma||eosinophilic phenotype||eosinophilic granulomatosis with polyangiitis
single_dose: patients with severe asthma aged 12 years and older 100 mg || adult patients with EGPA 3x100 mg

disease_name: Major depressive disorder||Cancer-related anxiety||Cancer-related depression||Eating disorders||Headaches||Substance abuse||Alcohol abuse||Opioid abuse||Smoking||Cocaine abuse
single_dose: adults 25 mg (oral capsule)||adults 1 mg (intravenous)||adults 10-20 mg (oral, equivalent to 1 mg IV)
side_effects: hallucinatory side effects||headache||slight increase in blood pressure

indication: acid reflux||heartburn||regurgitation||difficulty swallowing||upper abdominal pain||belching||weight loss||vomiting||poor appetite
recommended_usage: take without food||at fixed time||swallowed with water
mechanism_of_action: proton pump inhibitor; reduces stomach acid by irreversibly binding to ATPase enzyme
storage_conditions: store at room temperature||keep in a dry place||protect from light

unsuitable_population: patients with cyst on the ovary||patients with fibroid tumor of the uterus||patients with inflamed veins due to blood clots||patients with endometriosis||patients with liver disease||patients with depression||patients with unusual vaginal bleeding||pregnant women

single_dose: adults 12.5 mg (Day 1)||adults 12.5 mg twice/d (for 2 days)||adults 25 mg twice/d (for 4 days)||adults 50 mg twice/d (for 7 days)||adults 100 mg twice/d (for 7 days)

mechanism_of_action: induces loss of consciousness||produces relaxation to relieve pain
side_effects: addiction||hallucinogenic effects||dissociative effects||physical health effects||mental health effects

indication: watery eyes||itchy eyes||itchy nose||itchy throat||runny nose||sneezing
mechanism_of_action: relieve watery eyes, itchy eyes/nose/throat, runny nose, and sneezing
side_effects: drowsiness||dizziness||blurred vision||upset stomach||nausea||constipation||dry mouth||dry nose||dry throat||mental/mood changes||confusion||hallucinations||trouble urinating||fast heartbeat||irregular heartbeat||seizure||rash||itching||swelling||severe dizziness||trouble breathing
unsuitable_population: children under 6 years||children under 12 years (for some products)||patients with breathing problems||patients with diabetes||patients with glaucoma||patients with heart problems||patients with high blood pressure||patients with kidney problems||patients with liver disease||patients with seizures||patients with stomach/intestinal problems||patients with overactive thyroid||patients with urination problems||elderly
